summary:
What is Mask Network? - Mask Network brings privacy and benefits from Web3 to social media like Facebook & Twitter - with an open-sourced browser extension.

 Using Mask Network - Install the Mask Extension

Login with Mask ID and connect your wallet

Use familiar Web 2.0 sites, enhanced with Web3 integrations

 Encrypt Messages For Friends’ Eyes Only - Use the Mask Extension to hide your content from prying eyes and allow only your target audience to see it.

 Built In Social Trading Tools - With integrated widgets on social media platforms, you’ll be able to view the latest prices of crypto assets without leaving the page. Powered by Uniswap, SushiSwap, Ox, and dHEDGE.

 Verify NFT Avatars - Got a BAYC or a Punk? Get your profile pictures verified on-chain. For free.

 Create Your Own Web 3 Profile - Aggregate your digital activities - including NFTs, POAPs, donation records etc - all in one place. Anonymised or not, that’s completely up to you.

 Shop at Social Marketplaces - Buy and sell NFTs directly from social media platforms. Powered by OpenSea and other NFT marketplaces.

 Start and Take Part In Giveaways - Gift NFTs and tokens to users on a first-come-first-served basis.

 Store Your Files On a Decentralised Network - Use a next generation Dropbox. Permanent, uncensorable, open to all. Powered by Arweave.

 On-ramp Fiat easily - Buy crypto assets directly via credit card or bank transfer in over 60 countries. Powered by Transak.

 Join the Mask Network Community - Mask Network is trusted and supported by an active community of users and contributors. Join us!
